#summary Fundamental essence
#labels GameDesign

Each element captures a distinct, fundamental essence of nature.

Elements:

|| *Element* || *Nature* || *Creature* ||
|| [Air]     ||  Gases   ||  Breath    ||
|| [Water]   ||  Fluids  ||  Blood     ||
|| [Earth]   ||  Solids  ||  Flesh     ||
|| [Fire]    ||  Energy  ||  Life      ||

Derived elements:

  * [Body] = Water + Earth
  * [Frost] = Wind + Water
  * [Metal] = Earth + Fire
  * [Spirit] = Wind + Fire
